thread.title: Great value with great English breakfast!
thread.title_full: Great value with great English breakfast! - Review of Days Hotel London- Waterloo, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: woodyandbean
title: Great value with great English breakfast!
text:
Stayed here on a Saturday night during February.
It is further out from the centre than I've stayed before but was cheaper too!
About 40 mins walk to areas with shops such as Harrods etc.
Very easy to get to with parking out front (around 10 spaces) charged at Â£20 for 24 hours.
We checked in earlier than the 2pm states staff were very helpful.
We stayed in room 201 which was next to a flight of stairs but honestly didn't hear any sound at all.
Lovely bathroom,standard bed with tv and kettle.
Check out is 11am.
Excellent breakfast with buffet style full English, great choice of all the fried bits plus juices, pastries and fruit!
Would stay here again but wouldn't recommend for someone who isn't able to walk distances due to the location.
